title: Gold heads for best week since 2020 as Greenland crisis rattles dollar
summary: Price closes in on $5,000 per ounce and silver tops $100 as Trump’s shortlived tariffs threat sparks rush into precious metals

title: There's a new idea of alpha in the market that big fund managers are pursuing
summary: Stock pickers can't beat the S&P 500, and market experts say it's time to stop trying and seek broader portfolio alpha across cash, bonds, gold and commodities.

title: Indian Refiner BPCL to Sign $780 Million Oil Supply Deal With Petrobras
summary: India’s state-owned refiner Bharat Petroleum Corporation Limited (BPCL) is set to sign next week an oil supply deal with Brazilian state giant Petrobras for the delivery of 12 million barrels of crude, valued at about $780 million. title: Adani group stocks plunge as U.S. SEC looks to question founder over fraud charges
summary: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission is seeking permission to send summons to Gautam Adani and two others over fraud and bribery charges.

title: India Turns to Atlantic and Middle Eastern Crude as Russian Supplies Falter
summary: Indian Oil Corp. has bought several crude oil cargos from Angola, Brazil, and the UAE to replace Russian barrels under sanctions, Reuters reported today, citing unnamed sources. title: Shell Considers Asset Sales in Argentina’s Shale Heartland
summary: Shell may be considering leaving the Vaca Muerta shale play in Argentina, Reuters has reported, citing unnamed sources. title: Traceable gold brand targets growth after deal with net zero mine

title: Venezuela’s lawmakers back oil sector reforms
summary: Legislation that could reach final approval next week allows foreign and local private companies to commercialise oilfields
